definitions.definition: An indication of excitement , surprise , astonishment , or pleasure .
An expression of amazement , awe , or admiration .
examples: Wow! How do they do that?

definitions.definition: Used sarcastically to express disapproval of something.
examples: Wow … good job using all of our supplies on the first day.

main_definition: An indication of excitement , surprise , astonishment , or pleasure .
secondary_definitions: An expression of amazement , awe , or admiration .
Used sarcastically to express disapproval of something.
